title: Chapter 4371 - Chapter 4371: 4370, An All-Out War, A War Of The Universe! 9
body:
Chapter 4371 - Chapter 4371: 4370, An All-Out War, A War Of The Universe! 9

Chapter 4371: 4370, an all-out war, a war of the universe! 9

“What?”

“Not good, we are no match for the Dragon King and the rest. Run, run, run!”

When Wang Xian made his move and instantly killed four heaven origin creation stage powerhouses.

In the surrounding area, the other seven heaven origin creation stage powerhouses from the Void universe were completely terrified!

Too strong!

Too strong!

It was completely unstoppable!

“Ah! No!”

At this moment, another scream was heard.

A heaven origin manifestation powerhouse at the control level was killed by the Fallen Shadow Demon Emperor.

He wasn’t killed by the Fallen Shadow Demon Emperor alone either.

Instead, Xiao Lan and Jiuli from the demon race attacked the nearest heaven origin manifestation powerhouse after Wang Xian killed their target.

This heaven origin creator from the Void Universe was being suppressed by the Fallen Shadow Demon Emperor!

How could he withstand the sudden sneak attack?

This was completely unethical!

In an instant, the heaven origin creator who was at the control level was killed!

“Let’s finish this battle quickly. After we kill them, let’s go look for the king of Void!”

Wang Xian looked at the fallen Shadow Demon Emperor and said!

“No Problem!”

The Fallen Shadow Demonic Emperor nodded. With a move, it headed straight for the control-level powerhouse who was besieged by the twelve ancestral witches.

This control-level powerhouse was being attacked by the Elf Queen of the twelve ancestral witches and the ancestor of the underworld race.

He was already completely suppressed.

When he sensed that the fallen shadow demonic emperor was attacking him, he could no longer hold back!

He gave up resisting immediately!

Resist?

Was it effective?

It was useless!

The third control-level powerhouse was eliminated!

At this point, only the Devil Emperor was still resisting tenaciously!

He wanted to escape now, but he was locked onto by the Devil Emperor. It was already a huge problem for him to hold on for a few minutes, let alone escape!

Wang Xian waved his arm and a terrifying sword of light attacked him.

This was also the last control-level existence. He had given up completely.

Four control-level experts were all killed.

In addition, there were three beginner-level existences who were still resisting in despair.

As for the disciples at the back, their faces were filled with fear.

The lords of their dynasty were dying rapidly.

The terrifying nine-origin universe army had already charged over.

What welcomed them was destruction!

“Leave this place to the others. Let’s Go and chase after the King of Void!”

Wang Xian saw this scene and did not continue to attack. Instead, he spoke to Devil Fiend, Fallen Shadow Devil Emperor, and the rest!

The two of them nodded.

There were only three control-level existences left. Facing more than 20 heaven-origin creation-level powerhouses in the nine-origin universe?

They would not last more than a few seconds.

Therefore, they didn’t need to make a move in this situation.

Of course, there were heaven origin creator-level powerhouses from the Void dynasty who were killed and were resurrected in the dynasty inside.

However, even if they were resurrected, the strength of the 12 ancestor witch elven empress and the rest was sufficient to finish them off.

Their primary goal was to kill the king of Void once again.

Now, the king of Void’s strength had already fallen to the control-level.

If possible, Wang Xian wanted to get rid of him completely!

“An lie!”

Wang Xian called an lie over. With a wave of his arm, the map of the Void Universe appeared in front of him.

“The king of Void’s location should be around here. Bring us here.”

Wang Xian instructed him.

“It’s the Dragon King!”

An lie nodded and disappeared with them instantly.

The demonic spirit altar was in the Void Universe. It was an altar used to summon spatial demon beasts to battle.

It covered the entire void universe.

An lie now had a detailed understanding of the map in his mind.

He could roughly guess where the map corresponded to the Void Universe!

In the next second, Wang Xian and the rest appeared on a planet!

“I heard that the Army of the nine-origin universe has invaded our void empire. It’s going to be difficult for our void universe to defend against them!”

“I don’t know the exact situation, but how can a tiny nine-origin universe invade the center of Our Universe? According to the information I got from the history books, the previous few catastrophes were all fought by our king to the nine-origin universe. Killing the living beings in the nine-origin universe was like slaughtering a dog!”

“The nine-origin universe seems to have risen up. There is indeed a great war breaking out in the Void dynasty. I hope our king and the rest can eliminate these damn invaders.”

“I heard that our king hasn’t appeared yet. As long as our King returns, we will definitely be able to kill them all.”

When Wang Xian and the rest appeared on this planet.

They were floating in the air.

Some voices entered their ears.

“Hehe!”

When the fallen Shadow Demon Emperor heard that, he smiled gently.

“Over there!”

Wang Xian’s gaze was fixed in a certain direction as he flew over quickly!

The Demonic Fiend and the fallen Shadow Demon Emperor followed quickly.

Buzz Buzz Buzz

Buzz Buzz Buzz

At the same time, in the void in front of them.

The void King was running frantically.

The communication device on his body kept transmitting urgent messages.

He glanced at them and saw the messages. His expression was extremely ugly.

He never thought that one day, the army of the nine-origin universe would attack their void dynasty.

They would attack the Void Universe.

And now, they wanted to attack their entire universe.

“Run, that Dragon King and the others have tracking treasures, you guys run First!”

The void King’s face was gloomy as he ordered his subordinates.

They had already lost.

They couldn’t stay in the Void universe anymore.

They would only dare to return after the calamity ended.

Now, their home had become the most dangerous place.

“Weng Weng!”

“Weng Weng!”

Just as Void King sent out the message.

He suddenly felt the space around him shake.

Three extremely terrifying energies appeared around him.

“How is this possible? How can it be so fast?”

Void King roared!

“Void King, Stray Dog, can you escape?”

Fallen Shadow Demon Emperor stared at Void King and said with a cold and mocking expression.

“You…”

Void King’s expression changed drastically.

“You once attacked our 9-origin universe and massacred the living beings of our 9-origin universe. You Didn’t expect this day to come, did you?”

Falling Shadow Demon Emperor continued to say coldly!

Weng

He instantly arrived in front of void King and grabbed his neck.

“I didn’t expect it!”

The king of Void smiled bitterly. When the fallen Shadow Demon Emperor arrived in front of him, his body trembled.

His life force was immediately dispersed.

He committed suicide!

He didn’t want to be captured and tortured by the fallen Shadow Demon Emperor.

“Dragon King, take the corpse!”

The Fallen Shadow Demon Emperor looked at the king of Void’s corpse and threw it to Wang Xian.

“Alright, I will distribute it in the end!”

Wang Xian nodded and kept the body of the fallen Shadow Demon Emperor. Following that, the lamp of divination continued to perform divination!

“He is still somewhere in the Void Universe. Let’s go and continue the pursuit!”

“His strength is still at the control level!”
